mainTask.title: Linear/Vercel-Inspired Homepage Transformation
mainTask.description:
Transform our current homepage/landing page into a Linear + Vercel–inspired interface while strictly following our existing systems and rules. This task follows the AUDIT → DECIDE → APPLY → VERIFY methodology to ensure systematic execution.

RUN_DATE=2025-01-27T10:00:00.000Z
Total Steps: 16
Estimated Hours: 20
Phases: 4 (AUDIT, DECIDE, APPLY, VERIFY)

subtasks.title: Phase 1 — Theme Enhancement
subtasks.description: Goal: Enhance existing theme system with Linear-specific tokens and components.

actions.title: Add elevation/shadow tokens for Linear-style surfaces
actions.description: In styles/globals.css, add elevation tokens: --elevation-0, --elevation-1, --elevation-2 for subtle Linear-style shadows.
actions.verification: Test elevation tokens on Surface components; shadows appear subtle and Linear-like.

actions.title: Create theme toggle component with accessibility
actions.description: Create components/ui/theme-toggle.tsx with proper ARIA labels, keyboard support, and icon switching.
actions.verification: Theme toggle works with keyboard, screen readers, and switches between light/dark modes.

actions.title: Enhance micro-interaction tokens
actions.description: In styles/motion.css, add Linear-specific micro-interaction tokens for hover states and transitions.
actions.verification: Micro-interactions feel smooth and Linear-like; duration 80-150ms with subtle easing.

actions.title: Add Linear-specific spacing patterns
actions.description: Add --space-section, --space-section-sm, --space-section-lg tokens for consistent section spacing.
actions.verification: Section spacing follows Linear patterns; consistent rhythm throughout homepage.

subtasks.title: Phase 2 — Homepage Refinement
subtasks.description: Goal: Refine existing homepage with Linear/Vercel design principles and proper hierarchy.

actions.title: Refine hero section with Linear typography hierarchy
actions.description: In app/page.tsx, enhance hero section with proper display typography, tight leading, and Linear-style hierarchy.
actions.verification: Hero section has clear hierarchy; display text is prominent, subtext is readable, CTAs are clear.

actions.title: Enhance feature cards with subtle elevation
actions.description: Apply elevation tokens to feature cards; add subtle hover states with elevation changes.
actions.verification: Feature cards have subtle shadows; hover states elevate smoothly; feels Linear-like.

actions.title: Add social proof section with muted styling
actions.description: Add social proof/logos section with grayscale styling, proper spacing, and subtle presentation.
actions.verification: Social proof section is subtle and professional; logos are muted, spacing is consistent.

actions.title: Implement CTA section with proper spacing
actions.description: Add final CTA section with condensed layout: headline, one sentence, primary button.
actions.verification: CTA section has good rhythm; spacing between sections is consistent and Linear-like.

actions.title: Add navigation header with translucent effect
actions.description: Create sticky navigation header with theme toggle, translucent background, and proper CTAs.
actions.verification: Navigation is sticky, translucent on scroll, has theme toggle, and clear CTAs.

actions.title: Enhance footer with multi-column layout
actions.description: Create footer with multi-column link groups, subdued contrast, and legal links.
actions.verification: Footer has proper multi-column layout, subdued styling, and all necessary links.

subtasks.title: Phase 3 — Accessibility & Performance
subtasks.description: Goal: Ensure WCAG AA compliance and optimal performance across all devices.

actions.title: Ensure WCAG AA contrast compliance
actions.description: Audit all text/background combinations for WCAG AA contrast ratios in both light and dark themes.
actions.verification: All text meets WCAG AA contrast requirements; no accessibility violations.

actions.title: Add proper focus states and keyboard navigation
actions.description: Ensure all interactive elements have visible focus states and proper keyboard navigation order.
actions.verification: Focus states are visible; keyboard navigation works correctly; no keyboard traps.

actions.title: Optimize for Core Web Vitals
actions.description: Optimize images, reduce CLS, improve LCP, and ensure good performance scores.

actions.title: Test reduced motion preferences
actions.description: Ensure all animations respect prefers-reduced-motion and provide fallbacks.
actions.verification: Reduced motion preferences are respected; animations are disabled when appropriate.

subtasks.title: Phase 4 — Verification & Polish
subtasks.description: Goal: Final testing, cross-browser compatibility, and performance verification.

actions.title: Cross-browser testing
actions.description: Test homepage across Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge for visual consistency.
actions.verification: Homepage looks consistent across all major browsers; no visual regressions.

actions.title: Mobile responsiveness verification
actions.description: Test homepage on mobile devices; ensure proper touch targets and responsive layout.
actions.verification: Homepage is fully responsive; touch targets are appropriate; mobile UX is smooth.

actions.title: Performance audit
actions.description: Run final performance audit; check bundle size, loading times, and Core Web Vitals.
actions.verification: Performance metrics are optimal; bundle size is reasonable; loading is fast.

actions.title: Final accessibility audit
actions.description: Run comprehensive accessibility audit; test with screen readers and keyboard navigation.
actions.verification: Accessibility audit passes; screen reader compatibility confirmed; keyboard navigation works.
